## Load DB from Sql DB

Use RMySQL library

```{r cars}
library(RMySQL)
con <- dbConnect(RMySQL::MySQL(),dbname = "movie_rate", user="root", password="Kakao123")
query <- dbSendQuery(
  con,
  "SELECT
  Movies.MovieName AS 'MovieName',
  Users.UserName AS 'UserName',
  Rating.Rating AS 'Rating'
  FROM
  Rating
  LEFT JOIN
  Users ON Users.UserID = Rating.UserID
  LEFT JOIN
  Movies ON Movies.MovieID = Rating.MovieID
  ORDER BY UserName;"
  )

movie_rate <- dbFetch(query)

head(movie_rate)
```
